summary: Don't generally post art on here, but I spent a decent amount of time on this one and I actually don't hate it XD Spent 3 hours...
body:
Don’t generally post art on here, but I spent a decent amount of time on this one and I actually don’t hate it XD Spent 3 hours trying to make the hands not look awful but like they still do so there’s that… aha ^^;

Anyway this is my take on a pastel version of Dan and Phil based on the photo they did after the pastel video obviously.

reblog.comment:

Anyway this is my take on a pastel version of Dan and Phil based on the photo they did after the pastel video obviously.

trail.content_raw:
